entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:15 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 26. Wind chill minus 44 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
